model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: I loaded up on repellent like you said and I also grabbed a few of those mosquito repellent bracelets, I figured why not!

[MEMORY]
1. Speaker B recently went on a long hike and enjoyed it
2. Speaker A enjoys going on camping trips and hiking trails in parks.
3. Speaker A has planned several camping trips for the summer and will be doing a part of the Appalachian Trail.
4. Speaker B shared tips on repelling mosquitos using sprays with 20% DEET and other active ingredients.
5. Speaker A enjoys camping and hiking as free activities.
6. Speaker B gets scared by bugs and creepy crawlies in the outdoors.
current_dialogue: Speaker A: I loaded up on repellent like you said and I also grabbed a few of those mosquito repellent bracelets, I figured why not!
memory_text:
1. Speaker B recently went on a long hike and enjoyed it
2. Speaker A enjoys going on camping trips and hiking trails in parks.
3. Speaker A has planned several camping trips for the summer and will be doing a part of the Appalachian Trail.
4. Speaker B shared tips on repelling mosquitos using sprays with 20% DEET and other active ingredients.
5. Speaker A enjoys camping and hiking as free activities.
6. Speaker B gets scared by bugs and creepy crawlies in the outdoors.
speaker: Unknown
raw_prediction: Yeah, I went on a long hike last weekend and it was amazing. I love being out in nature and exploring new trails.
prediction:
Brief explanation: The memory contains helpful information related to the conversation. The dialogue context mentions that Speaker A has taken Speaker B's advice regarding mosquito repellents. The memory then illustrates that it was Speaker B who had provided tips on using mosquito repellents with specific active ingredients, in this case, 20% DEET. These details connect well and are useful in generating an informed response.
Judgement: Yes
